Indian Economy.title: From IMF, a note on resilience in face of uncertainty
Indian Economy.summary: It is a matter of pride that the IMF singled out India for turning into a key engine of global growth, but under the circumstances, it is best not to let the guard down

Indian Economy.title: Does it matter if India’s trends of nominal and real GDP growth diverge?
Indian Economy.summary: India’s high real GDP growth numbers reflect extraordinarily low inflation readings. Nominal GDP, which has weakened, offers a better view of the economy for practical purposes. Expect RBI to lower borrowing costs.

Sensex, Nifty, Share Price LIVE: The benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty held firm at mid=session on Monday.
At 12:19 pm, Sensex had topped the 84,000 level to quote at 84,401.83, up 
+449.64 or 0.54 per cent firmer than its close on Friday. Nifty was at 25,85…
